title: A Bunch of Men’s Button Downs (From $16) Are on Sale at Amazon
text:
10 items in this article 10 items on sale! Photo: Courtesy of retailer

The official beginning of fall is a week away, but a bunch of autumnal men’s button-down shirts are on sale from Amazon’s house brands. This means that dozens of flannels, patterned oxford shirts, and a lot of denim button downs are (for the most part) up to 15 percent off, plus there are some hidden extra discounts on different sizes and styles, like a short-sleeve band-denim shirt that’s 40 percent off.
